alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued October 20 at 12:55AM PDT until October 23 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 possible. * WHERE...Esmeralda and Central Nye County and Lincoln County. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An incoming low pressure system will move through the region this weekend with the associated cold front passing through the southern Great Basin region on Saturday night/early Sunday morning. The first freeze of the season is expected to occur with the passage of this cold front for portions of Nye, Esmeralda, and Lincoln counties.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Lincoln County
